p: There were six RCTs (five double-blind studies and one open-label study) [ [17], [18], [19], [20], [21], [22]] and two prospective non-controlled studies [ 23, 24] on HIV that met the eligibility criteria; five studies used HCQ (including both non-controlled studies) [ 17, 18, 20, 23, 24] and three used CQ [ 19, 21, 22].
